General_Description: '''Ocean Threat''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens|Athenian]] [[ship]]s are gaining too much control of the sea."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra destroyed Athenian ships all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Masters of the Sea]] and [[The Naval Problem]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
